short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep only the tabs that are most needed. Otherwise, automatically close them!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Declutter your tab bar with a handy timer showing when you open a new tab. Be mindful about which tab to keep, and let the rest automatically close!
